name: Inery
intro: layer1 blockchain programmed for decentralised database management
introduce: Inery is a layer-1 blockchain that delivers a decentralized, high-performance, secure database solution for web3. IneryDB is the first-ever decentralized database management solution that combines all the dynamics and functionalities of database management, including CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete), complex query search, and library functions in a completely decentralized architecture. The blockchain is designed to enable cross-chain communication of data, greater speed, and better security. It specifically addresses database management integrated with blockchain functionalities and distributed database management properties.
